label: Pairing
comment: The process by which two potentially entities are linked.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code specifying the method of this communication pairing.
The indication of whether or not the entity is paired in this communication pairing.
The identifier of the target entity for this communication pairing.

objectProperties.comment: A matching event for this communication pairing.

referencedBy.comment: An IOT device reported communication pairing for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
A sensor communication pairing reported for this monitoring IOT device.
